name: Crazy Cat Rush Racing Run Kitty Craft
name_original: Crazy Cat Rush Racing Run Kitty Craft
description:
Crazy Cat Rush Racing is a racing game where you drive your car with cat inside. Enjoy endless hours of fun with your loved cat, run / drive to collect gold coins. Use coins to buy new cars. Explore new worlds, only racing with fast speed. It is very easy to control, drive as fast as you can, rush in the endless desert / city scene. Want to make friends with the cutest Girly Kitty Cats? Designed for Girls, Boys, Children and Families. Be quick, prove your skills and drive! You can challange your self in arcade mode with 4 different difficulties or you can play time trial and make the best time in leaderboards.


- 20 different cars to pick
- 3 well designed tracks
- 2 gameplay modes - arcade and time trial
- Be careful to avoid the barrier
- Cat driving / runner 3D game
- More scenery to rush
- Get more and more coins
- Drive as fast as you can
- Awesome graphics and endless fun driving
